items.title: Agentic Computing is Here, Just Not Evenly Distributed
items.summary: The future of computing is more personal and much more powerful. We are at an interesting stage presently where the capabilities of LLMs and the end-user experience are dramatically disconnected; a huge amount of engineering is yet to be done.

items.title: Using Kamiwaza Authentication and Model Inferencing with Any AI Application
items.summary: How to integrate Kamiwaza's authentication and model inferencing into any AI application.

items.title: 2024: A Year in Review for GenAI
items.summary: A look back at the year in GenAI

items.title: Harnessing the Power of Large Language Models
items.summary: A primer on the hardware requirements for deploying and leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs).
